E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/2/1992
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
The fans are not happy that you let Dennis Martinez go.
The overall fan interest decreases noticeably.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Friday, 3/3/1992
Subject: Contract offer
You have to be kidding me with your offer.
Offer more money or I will not even think about it.

Regards,
Ricky Horton



Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Brian Johnson
Dear Sir,
Brian Johnson isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Arkansas Travelers!
He has an AVG of .152, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1992
Subject: Status of Dave Eiland
Dear Sir,
Dave Eiland has an ERA of 5.16 at AA Arkansas Travelers.
I believe he isn't ready yet for that level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/3/1992
Subject: Status of David Bell
Dear Sir,
David Bell shouldn't play at AA Arkansas Travelers!
He has an AVG of .244 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Saturday, 5/6/1992
Subject: Status of Jesus Tavarez
Dear Sir,
Jesus Tavarez has an AVG of .240 at AA Arkansas Travelers!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Regards,
Scouting Director

Eddie Murray
